faqs.question: How is Momentum different from other to-do list apps?
faqs.answer: While other apps focus on managing lists, Momentum is built to build velocity. We cut out the complexity and clutter that gets in the way of actual productivity. Our intuitive design, focus on visual progress, and features like Flow State™ help you move from planning to doing, turning your tasks into a cascade of accomplishment. It’s not just about checking boxes—it’s about building unstoppable momentum.

faqs.question: Is my data safe and secure with Momentum?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. The security and privacy of your data are our top priorities. We use industry-standard encryption (both in transit and at rest) to protect all your tasks and personal information. We never sell your data, and you always own what you create. You can learn more about our commitment to your privacy in our detailed [Privacy Policy].

faqs.question: Can I use Momentum with my team?
faqs.answer: Yes! While Momentum is powerful for individuals, it's also brilliant for teams. Our Momentum for Teams plan allows you to share projects, assign tasks, and track collective progress—all while maintaining the same clean, intuitive interface. It’s designed to help your entire team build momentum together without the usual friction of project management tools.

faqs.question: Is there a limit to how many tasks I can create?
faqs.answer: No, you can create as many tasks as you need! We believe in empowering your productivity, not restricting it. Our free plan gives you unlimited tasks and subtasks to capture everything on your mind.

faqs.question: Can I access Momentum on my phone and computer?
faqs.answer: Yes, seamlessly. Momentum syncs instantly across all your devices—phone, tablet, and desktop. Whether you're capturing a quick task on the go or planning your week at your desk, your list is always up-to-date. Our mobile app is designed with the same focus on clarity and flow, so you never lose your momentum, no matter where you are.
